channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Dark Prince
channel.description:
**Dark Prince (Offensive)**
The Dark Prince is Neutral.
He is death immune at night.
As long as the Dark Prince is alive, the Prince's jail ability is disabled, but he is also immune to death at night.
----------
**Day Ability 1:** Jail someone of your choice. Works just like the prince. The jailed person will not know he is jailed by the Dark Prince. It will look like he was jailed by the prince.
**Night Ability 1:** Execute. 3 charges. You keep your charges even if your wrong. If you execute 3 people and you still haven't executed the prince, you commit suicide and lose the game.
**Comments:** The Dark Prince's winning condition is to execute the prince.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dark Prince
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I see this better as a neutral killer

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dark Prince
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
You inspired me and I submitted a similar idea: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-hitman/8864

I think that your win condition is way too specific.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dark Prince
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
I mostly wanted to avoid the whole:

“Hey i got jailed”
“Me too!!!”
“There’s a dark prince!!!”

But maybe ur right.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dark Prince
item.dc:creator: anon98616575
item.description:
In my opinion, Prince should still be able to jail, but get priority if you both choose the same target.

Interesting idea though.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dark Prince

item.description:
Dark Prince (Offensive)

The Dark Prince is Neutral.

He is death immune at night.

As long as the Dark Prince is alive, the Prince’s jail ability is disabled, but he is also immune to death at night.

Day Ability 1:
Jail someone of your choice. Works just like the prince.
The jailed person will not know he is jailed by the Dark Prince. It will look like he was jailed by the prince.

Night Ability 1:
Execute. 3 charges. You keep your charges even if your wrong. If you execute 3 people and you still haven’t executed the prince, you commit suicide and lose the game.

Comments:
The Dark Prince’s winning condition is to execute the prince.
